name: drust
goal: Drust aims at making superdrivers by providing high-quality services (ecodriving, predictive maintenance, crash assistance) to car owners through their smartphone and a device connected to their car. Our objective is to reduce CO2 and polluting emissions by 20% thanks to an easy-to-use and game-like approach for consumers, who also enjoy clear information on their car's health.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
GDPR
Building the European data economy
Extended Vehicle
ITS
